comment.author: 16167659@N04
comment._content:
This is my grandfather George Sydney Jefferys, he served as 3rd Officer on the SS Purley until it was sunk by a German submarine on the 25th of July 1917. He was born and lived in Newport Gwent South Wales UK
I don't think any part of him was English !

comment._content:
Thanks Gareth, will pass onto the curatorial team to correct.
Karen Roberts, Online Services
